It's definitely an 'in' place right now and was buzzing with people during my one visit.  Without a reservation, I had to wait for 50 minutes for a table for one at the meat restaurant.  But what a place to have to wait!  Multiple cuisines and bars to choose from, all with super views of the people and the space.  I had a simple solomillio at the steak place with the house red and a dark chocolate ice cream for desert and it was HEAVEN.  Service is a little slow but, given the crowds, it was understandable.  Definitely worth a visit to see if it's your thing.
